name: Gills View Bed & Breakfast

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A fantastic B&B. We are missing the wonderful breakfasts already! :-) Good location for exploring, with car-parking and close to town but away from road noise. Rooms are very clean and comfortable with kettle/tv etc. Very warm and genuine owners for whom nothing was too much trouble but without being intrusive. Good local knowledge for scenery and eateries...could not ask for more! Thank you and see you again!
reviews.title: Like home from home!

reviews.text: Really nice place, with a beautifull wiev and 5 min walk to the main street in Fort Williams.
reviews.title: Wonderfull place, wonderfull persons

reviews.text: The hosts are just the best
reviews.title: peaceful and calming

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: we have been to gills view several times over the last couple of years and have found it to be very warm and friendly ,a good atmosphere brought about by two hosts who will do anything for you. fantastic food,good clean rooms and a positive no problem attitude from the owners . me and my family would highly recommend gills view to anyone wanting to get away for a while.the place is just far enough away from town center to be quiet but close enough to walk to
reviews.title: Perfect Hosts

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A delightful place to stay, Steve & Michelle are wonderful hosts who made us very welcome in their home. Michelle does a great breakfast probably the best we've had. This B & B is probably the highest standard place we have stayed, the rooms are imaculate and well decorated. We would highly recommend this place.
reviews.title: Would Highly Recommend!

reviews.text: Great B&B, excellent location, warm welcome, would very much recommend. Hope to be back.
reviews.title: Excellent B&B

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Excellent accommodation and hospitality would recommend Gills View to anybody who is visiting Fort William.
reviews.title: Highly recommended

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed for a few days but would of loved to stay longer. Steve and Michelle made us feel so at home. They have two rooms a double and a twin both on suite with Tv and DVD. We stayed in the double and was amazed at the high standard of finished not only with the bedroom but also the on suite. We have stayed in lots of B+B's none as clean or as impressive. They provide tea coffee making facilities, there is also bottled water provided which is a nice change. The breakfast is home cooked just how you like it. Michelle could not do enough for us, she made sure we left the table full and ready for our 9 hour walk up Ben Nevis :-) There is parking for both cars and motorbikes. Its about 5-10 minutes walk from the town centre. Thanks for making our stay so comfortable we will definitely be coming back maybe next time i might come on my motorbike
reviews.title: A Home From Home

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at Gill's View for 1 night in June and it was absolutely wonderful.
reviews.title: Excellent B&B in Fort William

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Steve and Michelle were gracious hosts in this very small B&B. We really felt like were invited into their home. The breakfast was excellent. You won't go wrong with this B&B.
reviews.title: Keeping it local...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed for 3 nights at Gill`s view. It was the best stay that we ever had in Fort William. Our hosts, Steve and Michelle, gave us the feeling that we are at home and we enjoyed their hospitality. We had a double bedroom (en-suite). The room is lovingly decorated, very clean and comfortable. Everything fits perfectly together. One day we went on a day trip and we had to get up very early. So we`ve asked Michelle for the packed lunches. It was fantastic. We had sandwiches, fruit, crisps, cereal bars and yoghurt. It lasts for the whole day. Also the breakfast is fantastic, too.
reviews.title: A wonderful stay with a warm welcome

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: If someone wants to visit Fort William there`s only one place to stay: "Gill`s View".
reviews.title: Great Hospitality!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We phoned ahead of time that we’d be arriving pretty late, around 9pm or maybe after. It was not a problem at all for Steve and Michelle. We felt very welcomed when we showed up. There was a free car park available for guests. We had a cozy twin bedroom, with en suite bathroom. The free wireless connection worked fantastic! We were not frustrated connecting to the internet. Our breakfast was very good, made fresh and hot, with a choice of cereals, fresh fruits and orange juice. We were also welcomed with a fresh grapefruit. However, we didn’t have very comfortable beds. I found myself waking up a couple of times during the night. Also, we felt rushed to get out on time in the morning cause the check-out time was at 9:30am. Most of the BnB’s we had been in had a check-out time of either 10am or 10:30am. Overall, Gills View offered wonderful hospitality, a clean and cozy room that anyone would appreciate.
reviews.title: Lovely hosts, gorgeous views

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Gills View is a small B&B overlooking the loch. It was a bit hard to find so I would advise giving the owner a ring before hand to get directions. It is also on a very steep hill so if you are traveling when icy be very careful, it was raining when we stayed and our tires skidded when trying to 'power up' the hill. Other than that it is a fantastic place to stay. The room was gorgeous and the owners were so kind and generous. Breakfast was lovely and the bed was very comfortable. Cannot fault for service or room quality.
reviews.title: Our favourite B&B in Scotland

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We spent two nights here staying in the double, ensuite room after taking the sleeper train up from London. Very nice room with quality fixtures and fittings and a cracking view over the Loch. Breakfast was of a very high standard with lots of choice and set us up very well for the day. Steve & Michelle's hospitality really sets this place apart though and all the little touches made it a very enjoyable stay. We echo all the other comments made so far - it is very difficult to find a fault and, with a welcome this warm, you wouldn't want to. We will be back!
reviews.title: One of the best

reviews.text: this is the 10th trip to fort william where i have stayed at gills view over the past 3 years, this is a very well run and immaculate guest house where the owners steve and michelle have always made me and my colleagues feel very welcome and at home. the rooms are modern and finished to a very high standard. when you return form the town at night after dinner you will want to sit out on the decking overlooking the water and hills and just take in the view. over the past 30 years i have stayed in some nice and some expensive hotes but i have never experienced the quality and value that i get here. even the small detail like breakfast and presentation, (tust me you won't be dissapointed) the rooms are equiped with colour tv and a wide selection of movies to choose from.
reviews.title: wonderfull, friendly and welcoming guest house, i will always use gills view

reviews.text: I have stayed in Fort William many times and i must say the owners have really thought about what the customer wants. The rooms are en-suite and are very clean and comfortable and relaxing. Flat screen TV's and Sky within the rooms allows you to relax and gives you a real feel of home from home. In all my travels around Scotland the Breakfast put down to me in the morning really would put many top hotels to shame, simply the best. I would highly recommend a visit to anyone stopping off or passing through Fort William.
reviews.title: A B&B with 5 star rating

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We enjoyed spending 2 days in Fort William and stayed at Gill's View. Lovely place to stay. Double room with en-suite. Breakfast in the morning was the best I can honestly say I have ever had when staying out. There was nothing you would have wanted for breakfast that wasnt on the table. Michelle and Steve are also very nice and made us feel very comfortable staying in their house. Great sleep and local of b&b very quiet. Lovely view of the Loch from our bedroom window. Would definitely recommend to anyone to stay here and if we go back to Fort William we will definitely stay here again. Nicola and Davie
reviews.title: Fantastic place to stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Excellent B&B with genuine friendly hosts Michelle & Steve. The ensuite double room was spacious, clean & very comfortable. The addded extras of games, cards, binoculars, choclate bars etc were a nice touch. Michelles breakfast was second to none with a lot of care & thought put into it. anyone staying at Gills View cannot fail to enjoy their stay & be as impressed as we were.
reviews.title: Excellent place to stay

aka: Gills View Bed & Breakfast Fort William, Scotland
